channel.title: Changing the detail
channel.description:
I know it should probably be an easy question to answer, so I gave it a search and the most recent post I found with the word "detail" in it is dated back to 2006, and I was unable to find it in the FAQs that I could find.
Basically it says change the batch file, but the file is diffrent from 2006, it says to
"::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem, another 0 to make the song not startup"
Exactly where do I enter these commands, I tried entering ::param 0 and even ::param 1 and they did nothing in game, I tried adding them to the batch file and it did nothing.
I know there are higher detail settings because I've seen them in screenshots.
EDIT: I found out that the search dates are a bit messed up, still the topics that I found had extremely vague answers or none at all.

item.title: Changing the detail
item.dc:creator: @ldg1414 ldg1414
item.description:
@ldg1414 wrote:

I know it should probably be an easy question to answer, so I gave it a search and the most recent post I found with the word “detail” in it is dated back to 2006, and I was unable to find it in the FAQs that I could find.

Basically it says change the batch file, but the file is diffrent from 2006, it says to

“::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem, another 0 to make the song not startup”

Exactly where do I enter these commands, I tried entering ::param 0 and even ::param 1 and they did nothing in game, I tried adding them to the batch file and it did nothing.

I know there are higher detail settings because I’ve seen them in screenshots.

EDIT: I found out that the search dates are a bit messed up, still the topics that I found had extremely vague answers or none at all.

Read full topic
